title: Ascaso Expresso Coffee Machine

description:
This is a fantastic coffee machine that is in excellent condition. It is very rarely used anymore, hence the sale.

It has the accessories to either make a single or double espresso and a milk frother at the side to steam the milk for a latte, Cappuccino etc.

It also has a removable water tank at the back so you don't need to lift the entire machine to refill it.

On top of it is a cup heater so when you put the coffee in, your drink stays warm for a lot longer.

It is still on sale in Argos, where we bought it, for £189.

Here's the official blurb from the website.

Stainless steel boiler

Unique high gloss Red finish with chromed details

Transparent and removable water reservoir (capacity: 1,4 l.)

Self-priming system means machine is always ready for use

“Cappuccino System”: it mixes steam, air and milk, producing a rich, creamy froth for great cappuccino

This appliance can be used either with ground coffee (1 or 2 cups) or with the “Easy Serving Espresso” method

Single buttons with indicator lights for On/Off mode, and for selection of espresso and cappuccino

2 separate thermostats to control water and steam temperatures

Cup warmer

Steam emission regulating knob

Removable drip tray

Anti drip system

Incorporated coffee tamper

Weight (Kg):4.1

Rated voltage/Frequency (V~Hz):220/240~50/60

Input power (W):1100

Colour:Red

Maximum cup height (cm):7.7

On/off switch:✓

Pump pressure (bar):15

Removable drip tray:✓

Removable water reservoir:✓

Any questions just ask.

Thanks, Robert.
title: De'longi icona eco310 pump espresso machine

description:
Original price £284, asking £200 as it's been barely used, comes fully equipped and is in great condition. Open to offers.Collection only. Any questions just ask!

Product details:

2 Cup Capacity

1.4L Water Tank

Warming Plate

This DeLonghi EC330S coffee maker has a brushed stainless steel finish that will look great on any kitchen tabletop. Its high performance 15-bar pump pressure delivers great tasting espresso and cappuccino drinks, with no limit to the number of cups produced. The self-priming system of the EC330S means the machine is always ready for use. Its cappuccino system mixes steam, air and milk for a rich, creamy tasting drink. Easy to use, the DeLonghi coffee maker has a 2 cup capacity, and features a 3 button operation and a 1.4 litre water tank. A deep removable drip-tray allows for easy cleaning while a stainless steel boiler provides added durability and a longer life.

title: Nescafé coffee machine

description:
No mess, no fuss. Just great coffee.
Make a statement with the curvaceous NESCAFÉ Dolce Gusto Melody III. This machine is not only eye-catching, but with its maximum 15 bar pump pressure, creates your favourite drinks in a matter of seconds. The maximum 15 bar pressure pump is essential for delivering the golden crema that you get from coffee shop quality coffee.

For maximum freshness, our coffee pods are sealed after the roast has been ground to deliver to you a delicious aroma and full flavour. And with a wide variety of roast & ground coffees, delicious hot chocolate drinks and coffee shop specialties you'll wonder how you ever coped without it.

Because the coffee grinds stay in the pod there is virtually no cleaning either.

This machine has manual flow operation, not automatic.

This machine is in great condition, comes with the selection of coffee and milk pods.

Collection only, from a smoke and pet free house.
title: Nescafé Dolce Gusto Coffee Machine

description:
De'Longhi EC685.R Dedica Traditional Pump Espresso Coffee Machine 15 bar Red. Currently selling for around £170 new.

(see me working) txt me ill email a you tube link.

Used but well loved, all filters cleaned a few weeks ago and a new water pump fitted (thought it had failed, turned out to be a wee air lock so machine has years of life left!)

Selling as wife bought a pod machine for more convenience in the morning! I love this machine but no point having 2.

Designed by the experts at DeLonghi, this red Dedica Espresso Coffee Machine is a sleek coffee maker that marries super-smart Italian style with a narrow footprint that fits perfectly into the smallest kitchens so no coffee-lover needs to go without a perfect espresso, even if theyve a teeny tiny worktop.

Easy to Use

Super-simple push button operation allows you to programme the size of your coffee and the temperature you prefer for your favourite blend. It uses either ground coffee or ESE coffee pods so tasty coffee is achievable quickly. Three interchangeable portafilters make one or two cups simultaneously or use a pod. And it has an efficient steam arm to help you create hot frothed milk for cappuccino, latte or hot chocolate.

High Performance

A Thermoblock heating system heats water to exactly the right temperature for brewing coffee without scalding the grounds and a 15-bar pressure pump extracts the best possible flavour and aroma from your coffee grounds. Ready in 40 seconds.
title: De’Longhi Espresso Coffee Machine - Red

description:
This is an outstanding coffee machine, grinder etc used in my own business for less than 6 months before I had to sell my business due to ill health. I took exceptional care of this machine, it has been well maintained.

Iberital IB7 coffee machine - two group head.

Glossy finish stainless steel front panel
Adjustable and easy to clean steam pipe, with the right pressure for extraordinary steaming
Stylish backlit touch pads
Hot water control with anti-splash
Ergonomically tilted filter holder
Removable cup warming grid

Technical spec:
Adjustable touch panel settings
Boiler capacity 10.5 litres
Heating element 3,000W
Stainless steel steam pipes
Anti splash hot water outlet
Automatic boiler fill
Heating element protector device
Internal motor and pump
Weight 61kg
Dimensions: H 460mm / W 508mm / L 695mm

Macap M5D Digital On-demand commercial coffee grinder in silver

Sits squarely in the middle of the automatic range. With the convenience of a digital programmer, you can guarantee the perfect amount of coffee with each delivery. No guess work and no waste.

Probably the fastest growing grinder sector, Macap are undeniably the leaders in on-demand technology. Combining cutting edge design, superb speed & long-life burrs in a way that competitors can only dream of. With a Macap on-demand grinder there’s no need to load coffee in a doser, you simply grind exactly the right amount of coffee at exactly the right time! You get the freshest possible coffee – with zero waste.

Technical spec:
Hopper capacity 600g
2g per second capacity
Grinding speed of 1400RPM
58mm flat grinding blades - standard
Blade lifespan - 250kg
Motor power: 250W
W190 x D310 x H470mm

Also including:
Stainless steel countertop knock out drawer/ Freestanding knockout bin
Stainless steel jug, tamper, cleaning equipment

Grinder over £500 new
Coffee machine £2,200 new

Collection only.
Only looking for £2,000 (or nearest offer) for the lot.

Make up to ten cups of coffee at once, with a 1.25 L capacity glass carafe or choose to set your coffee maker to brew only one, two or three cups
The blue illuminated light ring will light-up when brewing and when the coffee is using the keep-warm feature, this also matches all other products in the Buckingham range
Designed to be much quicker when heating, the Buckingham coffee maker is 50% faster in reaching optimum temperature, meaning less time waiting for that ideal cuppa. Auto clean feature, Pause and Pour feature and Water level indicator

description:
Bosch Suny Tassimo Coffee Machine, Plus Stand and pod holder
Bought November 2017

Product Information
Colour Black

Capacity 800ml
Dimensions 28.6 x 20.6 x 34.5 cm
Model NumberTAS3203GB
Product Type Pod Machines
Type Coffee Machines
Weight 2.4kg
Brand Bosch

Deliciously easy! Your coffee shop favourites at the touch of a button.

Want a creamy latte, a tasty cappuccino or uplifting Americano? Just load a T DISC made with real ground coffee, press start and the TASSIMO’s INTELLIBREW system will automatically create the perfect drink.

The TASSIMO SUNY delivers drinks in a flash – we call it ‘The Quick One.’ With Smart Start technology, you can start brewing your favourite hot drink just by pressing your mug or cup against the front of the brewer. But the TASSIMO SUNY doesn’t just boast impressive speed, it’s also a popular choice because of its:

• Smart Start drink preparation
• Practical 0.8 litre water tank
• Sleek, stylish space-saving design
• Range of 4 eye-catching colours
• Ability to make over 40 big-brand hot drinks

So whether you’re looking for a coffee machine that delivers in a hurry, or just want a great-value and quality in each cup, choose the TASSIMO SUNY. Less waiting, more choosing.

A website called Idealo can help you get an idea of the price as new. This one will come with 1 year and 9 month balance of the 2 year warranty.

Another website called TheCoffeeMate has more details on the machine and John Lewis's website has it listed as well, with some reviews.

The machine comes with a 'starter kit' which includes the cleaning materials to descale it.

If you have any questions, please ask.
